channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Harris campaign deploys Bill Clinton to key states 22 days from Election Day
item.description: Bill Clinton is campaigning for Kamala Harris in the key battlegrounds of Georgia and North Carolina just three weeks shy of Election Day.
